channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘We never want to think our children would strip us of all our money’: Is it safe to give my kids my Social Security number?
item.description: “Regrettably, I have a good friend whose brother robbed their mother of a significant amount of money before her death.”

item.title: Why 2026 could be a banner year for regional-bank stocks
item.description: A steepening yield curve, a looser regulatory environment and increasing M&A activity all bode well, according to Catherine Mealor of KBW.

item.title: ‘Today’ host Jason Kennedy sells his renovated Agoura Hills home for $3.9 million in 45 days
item.description: Jason Kennedy, of NBC’s “Today” show, has found a buyer for his sprawling property in the Santa Monica Mountains in Los Angeles County.

item.title: The Big Short’s Michael Burry takes on the Big Tech bulls, but holds fire on this cult favorite.
item.description: Burry is betting against Nvidia and Palantir shares

item.title: Former Celtics star Jrue Holiday sells his Boston mansion for $6.69 million
item.description: Months after he was traded to the Portland Trail Blazers, Holiday has finalized the sale of his Boston home.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
